tasks_completed.task: Created ICA Website Component Reference Guide
details: Built comprehensive visual reference guide for non-technical use
Documented all 12 homepage components with exact file names
Listed all CSS variables, classes, and design system elements
Created usage examples showing proper terminology
tasks_completed.outcome: User now has complete reference guide to properly request website changes using actual file names and CSS classes instead of visual descriptions

next_session_context: User has visual reference guide for making precise component and style requests
